nodes.bodyText: Is this always true? (I do not know the answer but probably good to check wrt staging etc. endpoints.)

I copied this from the Python SDK, so I'm not sure what the source of truth is. But a quick code search doesn't return any obvious negatives.

  
    
      beam/sdks/python/apache_beam/options/pipeline_options_validator.py
